name: Squid Arena (Full Template Game) for Buildbox
name_original: Squid Arena (Full Template Game) for Buildbox
description:
Squid Arena full game template made with Buildbox (Version 3.4.4).

This recently had a spotlight with Buildbox and is now up for sale.

Quick note Before purchasing : 

You will need to change the name of this template.

Inside this template is the full game Squid Arena and artwork.

Games included are : Red light green light, Tug of war, Glass Bridge & Cookie cutting.

Theres also various animations for characters. Grab more from mixamo.com.

Also theres a character shop with awesome custom coding for 25 Items of headwear.

A daily timer (Zero Code) which currently unlocks after 24hrs. Once the timer is up This then unlocks the Prize wheel. The prize wheel can be customised to your liking and is very easy to setup on your own projects.

I recommend that you change artwork and game name for a better release of your own game.
